title: Add $50 deposit note with brief reasoning under each pricing plan

requirements.text: In the Pricing section, add a short note under each pricing plan (Basic, Standard, Premium) that states “$50 deposit required” and includes a brief, clear reason (e.g., that the deposit covers initial work like creating a website preview/prototype before full development). Use English for the new user-facing copy and keep the note visually subordinate to the plan description (small text / muted styling) while still readable in the dark theme.

quotes: under each pricing plan write smth like $50 deposit required and add some shirt reasoning like to build website preview ect...

acceptanceCriteria: Each of the three pricing cards (Basic, Standard, Premium) displays the exact phrase “$50 deposit required”.
Each pricing card includes 1 short sentence of reasoning next to or below the deposit phrase (e.g., mentions building a website preview/prototype).
The deposit note is displayed consistently across all plans and does not break the existing layout on mobile or desktop.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep all user-facing text in English for this change.
nonGoals: Implementing payments, invoicing, or deposit collection flows.
Changing plan prices, plan names, or existing feature bullet lists.
